translations.chinese: 漢王輟飯吐哺，曰：「豎儒幾敗乃公事！」
translations.english: King Han put down his food and spat it out, saying: "This pedantic scholar almost ruined your lord's affairs!"
He ordered them to hurry and destroy the seals.

translations.chinese: 又問陳平，乃從其計，與平黃金四萬斤，以間疏楚君臣。
translations.english: He also asked Chen Ping, then followed his plan, giving Ping 40,000 jin of gold to sow dissension and alienate Chu's ruler and ministers.

translations.chinese: 夏四月，項羽圍漢滎陽，漢王請和，割滎陽以西者為漢。
translations.english: In the fourth month of summer, Xiang Yu surrounded Han at Xingyang. King Han requested peace, offering to divide Xingyang west as Han territory.

translations.chinese: 亞父勸項羽急攻滎陽，漢王患之。
translations.english: Prime Minister Fan advised Xiang Yu to urgently attack Xingyang. King Han was troubled by this.
